message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but it's your call.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's a strong offer considering the time pressure.
Okay, I'm willing to negotiate.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor.  It's a fair compromise, and we can avoid further losses from inflation.
Alice, time is running out! This is my final offer. A 52/48 split in your favor.  Let's end this before we both lose even more to inflation.
